content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for expressing interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion, let me start with a suggested rental price of 950 Euros per month. However, I am open to exploring possibilities for compromise, depending on your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for sharing the initial price. Regarding your proposed rent of 950 Euros monthly, I must carefully consider my options. After assessing my financial situation and comparing similar apartments in the area, I would like to suggest a rental price of 875 Euros. This figure reflects both my desire to occupy this desirable apartment and my commitment to maintaining a reasonable budget. I hope we can find common ground in this negotiation.

If you accept this offer of 875 Euros per month, I will state 'I agree to the price of 875 Euro!' If you wish to continue discussing alternative terms, please provide me with further details. If we fail to reach an agreement, kindly respond with 'TERMINATE' to conclude the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
